alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wakulla and northeastern Franklin Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crawfordville, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, Sopchoppy, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Bald Point, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Mcintyre, Sanborn, Tully, Panacea, Shell Point, Medart, Buckhorn, Spring Creek, Liveoak Island and Curtis Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
